utterance: What is QuickXMarket?
answer: QuickXMarket is an on-campus delivery service designed to help students, faculty, and staff order groceries, food, essentials, and more from local vendors and have them delivered directly to dorms, departments, or pick-up points on campus.

utterance: Can you explain QuickXMarket?
answer: QuickXMarket is an on-campus delivery service designed to help students, faculty, and staff order groceries, food, essentials, and more from local vendors and have them delivered directly to dorms, departments, or pick-up points on campus.

utterance: Who can use QuickXMarket?
answer: All members of the university community, including students, faculty, and staff, can use QuickXMarket. You only need a valid university email address to sign up.

utterance: Can students and staff use QuickXMarket?
answer: Yes, all students, faculty, and staff can use QuickXMarket with a valid university email.

utterance: How do I place an order?
answer:
You can place an order through our website or mobile app:
• Select your vendor
• Choose your items
• Enter your delivery details
• Make payment via wallet, card, or transfer

utterance: Can you show me how to order from QuickXMarket?
answer:
You can place an order through our website or mobile app:
• Select your vendor
• Choose your items
• Enter your delivery details
• Make payment via wallet, card, or transfer

utterance: What types of items can I order?
answer: QuickXMarket offers delivery for meals, snacks, drinks, groceries, toiletries, stationery, study materials, and medical essentials from campus pharmacies.

utterance: Can I order groceries and food on QuickXMarket?
answer: Yes, you can order meals, groceries, snacks, drinks, stationery, and medical essentials from campus vendors.

utterance: What are the delivery hours?
answer: Delivery is available from 8:00 AM to 9:00 PM, Monday to Saturday. Availability may vary slightly depending on vendor operating hours.

utterance: When does QuickXMarket deliver orders?
answer: Delivery is available from 8:00 AM to 9:00 PM, Monday to Saturday. Availability may vary slightly depending on vendor operating hours.

utterance: How long does delivery take?
answer: On average, deliveries are completed within 30–60 minutes after your order is confirmed. You'll receive updates via email or app notifications.

utterance: How fast can I get my order?
answer: On average, deliveries are completed within 30–60 minutes after your order is confirmed. You'll receive updates via email or app notifications.

utterance: Is there a delivery fee?
answer: Yes. Delivery fees range depending on distance, order size, and demand. The exact fee is shown at checkout.

utterance: Do I need to pay extra for delivery?
answer: Yes. Delivery fees range depending on distance, order size, and demand. The exact fee is shown at checkout.

utterance: Can I schedule an order for later?
answer: No. We do not offer that service for now. Perhaps one day...

utterance: Can I order something for delivery tomorrow?
answer: No. We do not offer that service for now. Perhaps one day...

utterance: What if I'm not available when the delivery arrives?
answer: Our rider will wait for 5 minutes and attempt to call you. If you're unreachable, the order may be returned, and you'll be charged a re-delivery or restocking fee.

utterance: What happens if I'm not home when the order comes?
answer: Our rider will wait for 5 minutes and attempt to call you. If you're unreachable, the order may be returned, and you'll be charged a re-delivery or restocking fee.

utterance: Can I cancel or change my order?
answer: You can cancel your order before the vendor has accepted it. For dispatch, cancel before a rider is assigned. After that, cancellations are not guaranteed and refunds may not apply.

utterance: How do I cancel or modify my order?
answer: You can cancel your order before the vendor has accepted it. For dispatch, cancel before a rider is assigned. After that, cancellations are not guaranteed and refunds may not apply.

utterance: What payment methods can I use?
answer: We accept debit/credit cards, bank transfers, QuickXMarket wallet, and USSD payment options.

utterance: How can I pay for my order?
answer: Payments can be made using debit/credit cards, bank transfers, QuickXMarket wallet, or USSD options.

utterance: How do I track my order?
answer: You can track your delivery in real-time via the mobile app or website. You'll see the order status and estimated arrival time.

utterance: Can I see where my order is?
answer: You can track your delivery in real-time via the mobile app or website. You'll see the order status and estimated arrival time.

utterance: Is there a minimum order amount?
answer: No, there is no minimum order amount. You have the freedom to order how much you want.

utterance: Do I need to order a minimum?
answer: No, there is no minimum order amount. You can order as little or as much as you want.

utterance: My order is missing items or incorrect. What do I do?
answer: Contact our support team within 30 minutes of receiving the order through the app chat or support number. We'll resolve the issue or offer a credit/refund where appropriate.

utterance: I got the wrong order, how can I fix it?
answer: Contact our support team within 30 minutes of receiving the order through the app chat or support number. We'll resolve the issue or offer a credit/refund where appropriate.

utterance: What is a dispatch request?
answer: A dispatch request allows you to send items (documents, parcels, or personal packages) from one location on campus to another using QuickXMarket's delivery riders.

utterance: How do dispatch requests work?
answer: A dispatch request allows you to send items (documents, parcels, or personal packages) from one location on campus to another using QuickXMarket's delivery riders.

utterance: How do I contact customer support?
answer: Support is available from 8 AM to 9 PM through in-app chat, email, or phone.

utterance: Who can I reach out to if I have an issue with my order?
answer: Support is available from 8 AM to 9 PM through in-app chat, email, or phone.
